DOC.brief_summary: A comparison of changes in bone density following the same bone-health plan, but with a different bone-health supplement.
DOC.brief_title: A Comparison of Changes in Bone Density With the Same Bone-health Plan, But With Different Bone-health Supplements
DOC.detailed_description: The US Surgeon General's Report on Bone Health suggests America's bone-health is in jeopardy and issued a "call to action" to develop bone-health plans that: 1. improve nutrition, 2. increase health literacy and, 3. increase physical activity. The purpose of this study was to use a comparative effective research model to compare 6-month changes in bone mineral density (BMD)in two study groups. Both followed the same bone health plan that contained the three components listed above with the same plant-source calcium supplement, but enhanced with different levels of calcium, vitamin D3, vitamin K and magnesium.
DOC.criteria: All subjects were required to contact the physicians to ensure they had no medical issues that would preclude their participation. Younger the 18 years of age, and Recommendations not to participate from their physicians.
